question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-examples/diem-framework/crates/crypto-derive/src/unions.rs] [Cryptographic: Domain separation bypass] The sign() function (lines 222-226) signs generic CryptoHash types - without proper domain separation in the hash function, can signatures be replayed across different message contexts in Aptos consensus?
